Text: Chief Executive Jeff Bezos on Thursday committed the company to being carbon neutral by 2040 and said part of that pledge is an order for 100,000 electric delivery vans from a start-up the online retailer has invested in.
Cause: Chief Executive Jeff Bezos on Thursday committed the company to being carbon neutral by 2040
Effect: an order for 100,000 electric delivery vans from a start-up the online retailer has invested in.
Sentence: <e1>Chief Executive Jeff Bezos on Thursday committed the company to being carbon neutral by 2040</e1> and said part of that pledge is <e2>an order for 100,000 electric delivery vans from a start-up the online retailer has invested in.</e2>
